Text:
I've never downloaded a PPV, is the quality much different from a DVD?

And too bad Portman was cast in the movie, she SUCKS and is the main reason I didn't pay to see it!!!

Don't bother with this, folks.  It's by scenebalance, which means, even if by some miracle the torrent shows a seed, YOU WILL NOT get the movie.  Scenebalance posts tons of torrents, yet seeds NONE.

Just move along and don't bother with this assmaster.
